s.text: I'll try not to be cavalier about this, but asking me whether I ever play "real" people means you never saw my Mike Wallace or Alan Thicke on Saturday Night Live , and, more sadly, means that you're one of the Washingtonians deprived of my radio broadcast, "Le Show," on which you'd hear Clinton, Gore, Newt, Newt's mom, Carville, Dan Rather, Tom Brokaw, Hillary, Monica, Linda Tripp, Ken Starr, et al.
